CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses (domestic proceedings) - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed with ORG ( sąd wojewódzki ) an action in which he claimed damages from one of his partners in a partnership allegedly responsible for a sale of the partnership 's property without the applicant 's prior approval . He sued also a certain company X which had purchased that property .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court exempted the applicant from court fees .
CARDINAL . On DATE it refused the applicant 's request for an interim measure . His appeal against that decision was dismissed on CARDINAL DATE by ORG ( sąd apelacyjny ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted pleadings with a CARDINAL - page annex . In DATE and DATE , as well as in DATE , he submitted further pleadings and requested the summoning of CARDINAL witnesses .

CARDINAL . ORG held a hearing on DATE . It completed the examination of the case and informed the parties that it would pronounce its judgment on DATE . Subsequently , the applicant submitted pleadings containing motions concerning evidence . On DATE the court resumed the examination of the case .
CARDINAL . The hearing scheduled for DATE was adjourned because of the absence of a lay judge .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held a hearing .
CARDINAL . On DATE it declared its lack of jurisdiction over the applicant 's claims in respect of his partner and transferred that part of the case to ORG ( sąd rejonowy ) .
CARDINAL . ORG held hearings on DATE , as well as on DATE , DATE and DATE . It ordered an expert opinion .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court refused the applicant 's request for an interim measure .
CARDINAL . The expert opinion was submitted on CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant challenged that opinion .
CARDINAL . At the hearing held on CARDINAL DATE the court ordered a supplementary expert opinion .
CARDINAL . At the hearing of DATE the court completed the examination of the case .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant filed a petition in which he complained about certain errors in the minutes from that hearing . On DATE the court issued a decision concerning those errors .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted pleadings . On DATE the court resumed the proceedings and requested the applicant to specify his claim .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant requested the court to summon a customs office to join the proceedings as an intervener for the applicant .

CARDINAL . At the hearing held on CARDINAL DATE the court dismissed that request . The applicant requested the written reasoning of that decision . On DATE his request was rejected as not provided for by the law .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court gave judgment . It awarded the applicant MONEY with interest . Both the applicant and the defendant company appealed .
CARDINAL . ORG held hearings on DATE and DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE it gave judgment . The court amended the judgment of the first - instance court in that it dismissed the action filed by the applicant . He received a copy of the written reasoning of that judgment on DATE . On DATE the applicant lodged with ORG a cassation appeal against that judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed that appeal .
